# resolveDefroster(for:with:)

**Instance Method**

Resolves which defroster to change.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func resolveDefroster(for intent: INSetDefrosterSettingsInCarIntent, with completion: @escaping (INCarDefrosterResolutionResult) -> Void)
```

```swift
optional func resolveDefroster(for intent: INSetDefrosterSettingsInCarIntent) async -> INCarDefrosterResolutionResult
```

## Parameters

- **intent**: The intent object containing details about the user’s request. Use this object to get the initial information, if any, provided by the user.
- **completion**: The block to execute with the resolution. You must execute this block at some point during your implementation of this method. This block has no return value and takes the following parameter:



## Discussion

Implement this method to resolve the which defroster to use. Use the intent object to identify the defroster specified by the user. If the car has more than one climate zone, use the intent’s [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSetDefrosterSettingsInCarIntent/defroster] property to identify the correct defroster.

## Resolving the Intent Parameters

- **resolveEnable(for:with:)**: Resolves whether you can enable or disable the defroster setting.
- **resolveCarName(for:with:)**: Resolves the car name.
